description.title: Callbacks: two phase commit with non life-cycle event, using eth.subscribe on logs
description.purpose: Deploys the relevancy contract which implements the two phase commit approach. Before transacting five times a javascript event subscriber is started using contract.events on an event containing an indexed address. The implementation of the contract is such that the call back arguments provides msg.sender, rather than it being in the implementation of the callback. As such we check that the user can see the event.
